languages.text: Управляйте колониями удаленно через меню колоний — его можно открыть через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom}.
You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text: Управляйте колониями удаленно через меню колоний — его можно открыть через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom}.
You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom}.
You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick-access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text: Puedes gestionar tus colonias a distancia usando la pantalla de gestión de colonia, a la que puedes acceder desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text: Puedes gestionar tus colonias a distancia usando la pantalla de gestión de colonia, a la que puedes acceder desde el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text: クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から開くことができるコロニー管理画面を使って、コロニーを遠隔管理することができる。
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text: クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から開くことができるコロニー管理画面を使って、コロニーを遠隔管理することができる。

languages.text: 您可以通过殖民地管理界面来远程管理您的殖民地，按下{console_bind|RightBottom}即可快速打开殖民地界面。
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text: 您可以通过殖民地管理界面来远程管理您的殖民地，按下{console_bind|RightBottom}即可快速打开殖民地界面。

languages.text: Du kannst deine Kolonien aus der Ferne über den Kolonieverwaltung-Bildschirm verwalten, der über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} geöffnet werden kann.
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst deine Kolonien aus der Ferne über den Kolonieverwaltungs-Bildschirm verwalten, der über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} geöffnet werden kann.

languages.text: Vous pouvez gérer vos colonies à distance en utilisant l'écran de gestion des colonies, qui peut être ouvert avec la commande d'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}.
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.

traits.locale_text: Vous pouvez gérer vos colonies à distance en utilisant l'écran de gestion des colonies, qui peut être ouvert à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom}.

languages.text: Hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} açılabilen koloni yönetimi ekranını kullanarak kolonilerini uzaktan yönetebilirsin.
languages.original_text: You can manage your colonies remotely using the colony management screen, which can be opened from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom}.
